fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> At the start of the game, you are given 4 Neutral Killing roles. The roles may not be multi-kill roles. Pick 2 roles and inherit their abilities.

> You may multitask.

> Any kill will be attributed to the role that has the ability you used to kill the player.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Kill all who would oppose you.
